dict.acceptation: 月亮，月球；卫星；月状物，新月状物；
闲逛；出神；[俚语] 露出屁股以戏弄；

sent.orig: What were your expectations and were you surprised that Moon won the tournament?
sent.trans: 你的期望是什么，Moon夺冠你是不是很惊讶？

sent.orig: But United Nations Secretary General Ban Ki-moon says the Copenhagen Accord is only a beginning.
sent.trans: 但是联合国秘书长BanKi-moon说哥本哈根协议只是一个开始。

sent.orig: I was not surprised that Moon won the tournament.
They counted four phases in a cycle: moon, half moon, moon and half moon.
sent.trans: 他们用四个阶段来计算一个周期：新月，半月，满月和半月。

sent.orig: Pale moon does rain, red moon does blow,white moon does neither rain nor snow.
sent.trans: 月光灰白，将有雨来，月光泛红，将要刮风，月光银白，无雨无雪。
